purseData.desc: Crafted from candy pink soft shiny calf leather, the small BON BON Bucket has a sculptural shape defined by a drawstring fastening and light gold hardware. Carry in hand using the leather and metal bracelet top handle consistent with the BON BON family, or use the adjustable and detachable leather strap to wear on the shoulder or cross-body.  Shiny calf leather Leather and metal top handle Drawstring closure Interior pocket Bag measures: L17 x H17.5 x W11cm Adjustable and detachable leather strap measures: 47cm Made in Italy By purchasing this product, you are supporting sustainable leather manufacturing through the Leather Working Groupndefined

Soft pebble leather and suede Inside snap pocket Center zip compartment Magnetic snap closure, fabric lining Adjustable handles with 11" drop Outside zip pocket Four protective feet at base 12 1/4" (L) x 10 1/4" (H) x 6" (W) Style No. C5265

9 X 5 X 2 IN (23 X 13.5 X 6 CM),TRIOMPHE CANVAS, TRIMMINGS IN CALFSKIN,TEXTILE LINING,GOLD FINISHING,SHOULDER AND HAND CARRY,ZIPPED CLOSURE,ONE INNER FLAT POCKET,ADJUSTABLE STRAP WITH A MINIMUM DROP 8 IN (22 CM) AND MAXIMUM DROP 9 IN (23 CM),REFERENCE : 193952BZJ.04LU
Pivoine Pink Monogram coated canvas Natural cowhide-leather trim Textile lining Gold-color hardware Leather tab magnetic closure Name tag Zipped inside pocket Handle:Single
